description.value:
Mechadendrite Equipped with Plague Claw Weapon (Melee;1d10+2;Pen 2;Decay(3), Tearing). Grants +10 to Medicae Tests for Diagnose and Chem-Use Special Uses. Can store samples of Plagues, Toxins, and other conconctions, can be loaded with one as a Full Action, until end of encounter any damaged by its weapon suffer Diseases/Toxin's effects.

Requirements

Despite being a Mechadendrite it doesn't need Mechanicus Implants. Is incredibly Heretical however.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
